races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Curious, ambitious, and versatile, half-elves are welcome everywhere, but struggle without a community to call their own.

racial_features.name: Civil Militia
racial_features.description: Weapon Proficiency with Spears, Pikes, Halberds, Glaives, Light armour, and Shields.

racial_features.name: Darkvision
racial_features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

racial_features.name: Fey Ancestry
racial_features.description: Advantage on Saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep.

subraces.name: High Half-Elf
subraces.description: A touch of the Feywild remains in half-elves with this bloodline, and even those untrained in magic possess a hint of wild power.

features.name: Cantrip Selection
features.description: Choose 1 Cantrip from the Wizard spell list.

subraces.name: Wood Half-Elf
subraces.description: Like their wood elf parent, these half-elves have a quickened stride and an eye for stealth.

features.name: Proficiency
features.description: Proficiency in Stealth checks.

features.name: Fleet of Foot
features.description: Your Movement Speed is further increased by 1.5 m / 5 ft.

subraces.name: Drow Half-Elf
subraces.description: Most half-drow result from liaisons between Seldarine drow and surfacers.

features.name: Drow Magic
features.description: Access to Dancing Lights at level 1, Faerie Fire at level 3, and Darkness at level 5.

races.name: Human
races.description: The most common face in Faerûn, humans are known for their tenacity, creativity, and endless capacity for growth.

racial_features.name: Civil Militia
racial_features.description: Weapon Proficiency with Spears, Pikes, Halberds, Glaives, Light armour, and Shields.

racial_features.name: Human Versatility
racial_features.description: Select an additional Skill to be Proficient in. Your carrying capacity is increased by a quarter.

races.name: Elf
races.description: With ethereal countenances and long lifespans, elves are at home with nature's power, flourishing in light and dark alike.

racial_features.name: Keen Senses
racial_features.description: You gain Proficiency in the Perception skill.

racial_features.name: Elven Weapon Training
racial_features.description: You have Proficiency with Longswords, Shortswords, Longbows, and Shortbows.

racial_features.name: Darkvision
racial_features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

racial_features.name: Fey Ancestry
racial_features.description: Advantage on Saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep.

subraces.name: High Elf
subraces.description: Heirs of the mystical Feywild, high elves value magic in all its forms, and even those who do not study spellcraft can manipulate the Weave.

features.name: Cantrip Selection
features.description: Choose 1 Cantrip from the Wizard spell list.

subraces.name: Wood Elf
subraces.description: These elves spend their reclusive lives in Faerûn's forests. Decades of training in archery and camouflage are enhanced by an otherworldly swiftness.

features.name: Proficiency
features.description: Proficiency in Stealth checks.

features.name: Fleet of Foot
features.description: Your Movement Speed is increased by 1.5 m / 5 ft.

races.name: Drow
races.description: Driven to the Underdark, most drow have adopted a ruthless pragmatism. While the Lolth-sworn delight in the goddess' evil tenets, the Seldarine reject Her attempt to overthrow the leader of the elven pantheon.

racial_features.name: Drow Weapon Training
racial_features.description: You have Proficiency with Rapiers, Shortswords, and Hand Crossbows.

racial_features.name: Superior Darkvision
racial_features.description: Can see in the dark up to 24 m / 80 ft.

racial_features.name: Fey Ancestry
racial_features.description: Advantage on Saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to Sleep.

racial_features.name: Keen Senses
racial_features.description: You gain Proficiency in the Perception skill.

racial_features.name: Drow Magic
racial_features.description: Access to Dancing Lights at level 1, Faerie Fire at level 3, and Darkness at level 5.

subraces.name: Lolth-sworn Drow
subraces.description: Raised by Lolth's cult in the city of Menzoberranzan, these drow embody the virtues of their corrupt and merciless goddess.

features.name: Red Eyes
features.description: By default, Lolth-sworn Drow have red eyes.

features.name: Locked Dialogue
features.description: Lolth-sworn Drow gain access to certain locked dialogue choices.

subraces.name: Seldarine Drow
subraces.description: Seldarine drow can be found seeking allies from all over Faerûn, aiming to settle their conflict with Lolth - and each other - by any means necessary.

features.name: Non-Red Eyes
features.description: By default, Seldarine Drow do not have red eyes.

features.name: Locked Dialogue
features.description: Seldarine Drow gain access to certain locked dialogue choices.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Creatures of intense emotion, half-orcs are more inclined to act than contemplate - whether the rage burning their bodies compels them to fight, or the love filling their hearts inspires acts of incredible kindness.

racial_features.name: Menacing
racial_features.description: You gain Proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

racial_features.name: Darkvision
racial_features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

racial_features.name: Relentless Endurance
racial_features.description: If you reach 0 hit points, you regain 1 hit point instead of becoming Downed.

racial_features.name: Savage Attacks
racial_features.description: When you land a Critical Hit with a melee weapon attack, you deal an extra dice of weapon damage.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small yet capable, halflings prefer the comforts of home and hearth - but their natural luck and dexterity makes them fine adventurers.

racial_features.name: Halfling Luck
racial_features.description: When you roll a 1 for an Attack roll, Ability check, or Saving throw, you can reroll the dice and must use the new roll.

racial_features.name: Brave
racial_features.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Frightened.

subraces.name: Lightfoot Halfling
subraces.description: Stealthy but social, these halflings travel all over Faerûn to make names for themselves.

features.name: Naturally Stealthy
features.description: Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have Advantage on Stealth Checks.

subraces.name: Strongheart Halfling
subraces.description: Legend has it that dwarven blood gave stronghearts their hardiness. Resistant to poison and wellsprings of endurance, these halflings easily hold their own.

features.name: Strongheart Resilience
features.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned and Resistance to Poison damage.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: As durable and unyielding as their homes of stone, dwarves are some of the finest warriors, miners, and smiths of Faerûn.

racial_features.name: Dwarven Combat Training
racial_features.description: You have Proficiency with Battleaxes, Handaxes, Light Hammers, and Warhammers.

racial_features.name: Darkvision
racial_features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

racial_features.name: Dwarven Resilience
racial_features.description: You have Advantage on Saving throws against being Poisoned and Resistance against Poison damage.

subraces.name: Gold Dwarf
subraces.description: These dwarves are known for their confidence and keen intuition. The culture of their Deep Kingdom values family, ritual, and fine craftsmanship.

features.name: Dwarven Toughness
features.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and increases by 1 again every time you gain a level.

subraces.name: Shield Dwarf
subraces.description: Great losses in ancient wars against goblins and orcs have led these dwarves to adopt a cynical mindset, but they will endure anything to restore their ancestral homelands.

features.name: Dwarven Armour Training
features.description: You have Armour Proficiency with Light armour and Medium armour.

subraces.name: Duergar
subraces.description: Once enslaved by the eldritch mind flayers, duergar adapted to freedom with harsh practicality. Their cold demeanours and gift of stealth are well-known throughout the Underdark.

features.name: Superior Darkvision
features.description: Can see in the dark up to 24 m / 80 ft.

features.name: Duergar Resilience
features.description: You have Advantage on Saving throws against illusions and against being Charmed or Paralysed.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.recharge_type: Per battle, does not use Spell Slots

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Small, clever, and energetic, gnomes use their long lives to explore Faerûn's brightest corners and darkest depths.

racial_features.name: Gnome Cunning
racial_features.description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.

racial_features.name: Shortened Stride
racial_features.description: Your movement speed is 7.5m / 25ft.

subraces.name: Rock Gnome
subraces.description: The most commonly seen gnomes on Faerûn's surface, rock gnomes are named as such for their hardiness and affinity for metal.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

features.name: Artificer's Lore
features.description: Add twice your Proficiency Bonus to History checks.

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
subraces.description: Even smaller than their cousins and twice as reclusive, forest gnomes are a rare sight in Faerûn. They master magic and craftsmanship in their distant, idyllic groves.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

features.name: Speak with Animals
features.description: Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts. Recharge: Long rest.

subraces.name: Deep Gnome
subraces.description: More guarded than their surface cousins, deep gnomes survive in the Underdark with darkvision and skilful stealth.

features.name: Superior Darkvision
features.description: Can see in the dark up to 24 m / 80 ft.

features.name: Stone Camouflage
features.description: You have Advantage on Stealth checks.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Descended from devils of the Nine Hells, tieflings face constant suspicion in Faerûn. Thankfully, their arcane abilities make them natural survivors.

racial_features.name: Darkvision
racial_features.description: Can see in the dark up to 12 m / 40 ft.

racial_features.name: Hellish Resistance
racial_features.description: Your blood protects you from flame, abyssal or otherwise. Gain Resistance to Fire damage, taking only half damage from it.

subraces.name: Asmodeus Tiefling
subraces.description: Bound to Nessus, the deepest layer of the Hells, these tieflings inherited the ability to wield fire and darkness from the archdevil Asmodeus' infernal bloodline.

features.name: Infernal Legacy
features.description: Grants specific spells as you level up.

subraces.name: Mephistopheles Tiefling
subraces.description: Descended from the archdevil Mephistopheles, these tieflings are gifted with a particular affinity for arcane magic.

features.name: Legacy of Cania
features.description: Grants specific spells as you level up.

subraces.name: Zariel Tiefling
subraces.description: Tieflings from Zariel's bloodline are empowered with martial strength, and can channel searing flame to punish their enemies.

features.name: Legacy of Avernus
features.description: Grants specific spells as you level up.

races.name: Githyanki
races.description: With a ruthlessness borne from mind flayer enslavement, githyanki ride the Astral Sea atop red dragons, bringing their silver swords and psionic might to bear against any trace of the illithid menace.

racial_features.name: Astral Knowledge
racial_features.description: Gain Proficiency in all Skills corresponding to a chosen Ability (Recharge: Long rest).

racial_features.name: Martial Prodigy
racial_features.description: Armour proficiency with Light armour and Medium armour, as well as Proficiency with Shortswords, Longswords, and Greatswords.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: A proud race that values clan and skills above all else. Once enslaved by dragons, they strive to be self-sufficient, not wanting to be beholden to anyone, not even the gods.

racial_features.name: Draconic Ancestry
racial_features.description: Your resistance and breath weapon type depend on your draconic ancestry.

subraces.name: Black Dragonborn
subraces.description: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the charcoal colouration and fizzling, acrid breath of black dragons.

features.name: Acid Breath
features.description: Spew forth a column of acid, dealing 2d6 Acid damage.

features.name: Draconic Ancestry (Acid)
features.description: The blood of ancient dragons flows through your veins. You are Resistant to Acid damage.

subraces.name: Blue Dragonborn
subraces.description: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the deep sapphire scales and charged, crackling breath of blue dragons.

features.name: Lightning Breath
features.description: Spew forth a column of lightning, dealing 2d6 Lightning damage.

features.name: Draconic Ancestry (Lightning)
features.description: The blood of ancient dragons flows through your veins. You are Resistant to Lightning damage.

subraces.name: Brass Dragonborn
subraces.description: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the burnished ochre hue and flickering, fiery breath of brass dragons.

features.name: Draconic Ancestry (Fire)

features.name: Draconic Ancestry (Fire)
features.description: The blood of ancient dragons flows through your veins. You are Resistant to Fire damage.

subraces.name: Green Dragonborn
subraces.description: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the brilliant emerald aspect and stinking, putrid breath of green dragons.

features.description: Spew forth a cone of poison, dealing 2d6 Poison damage.

features.name: Draconic Ancestry (Poison)
features.description: The blood of ancient dragons flows through your veins. You are Resistant to Poison damage.

features.description: Spew forth a cone of fire, dealing 2d6 Fire damage.

features.description: The blood of ancient dragons flows through your veins. You are Resistant to Fire damage.

subraces.name: Silver Dragonborn
subraces.description: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the glinting shine and scorching cold breath of silver dragons.

features.description: Spew forth a cone of ice, dealing 2d6 Cold damage.

features.name: Draconic Ancestry (Cold)
features.description: The blood of ancient dragons flows through your veins. You are Resistant to Cold damage.
